name: Escape - Demo v2.0
description:
Press the left mouse button to launch a stone that can attract monsters to move

When the detection sound wave touches the monster, it will turn red / when you get closer to the range of the monster, the vibration sound from the monster will become louder;

When the detection sound wave touches the Gate, it will turn yellow/When you get closer to the Gate range, the wind sound from the Gate will become louder;
